Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Ankhhor, overseer of Upper Egypt, with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, the shoulders have broken away, parallel hands in relief holding incised implements and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section and almost the entire rear surface are inscribed with rows of incised hieroglyphs; the foot section has broken away.
Condition: incomplete - foot section and shoulders missing
